Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Votes.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Title: Relates to veteran real property tax exemptions and state funding to localities that grant such exemptions
Summary: Provides that real property tax exemptions authorized by school districts to eligible veterans do not shift taxes to other school district taxpayers or reduce school revenue.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to veteran alternative tax exemptions
